intro: Neomolina, commonly known as the silverleaf tree, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Fabaceae. It is characterized by its small, trifoliate leaves and yellow flowers that bloom in clusters. The plant is native to tropical and subtropical regions of Africa and Asia. Neomolina species are often found in disturbed habitats such as roadsides and open woodlands. Its seeds are encased in pods and can be dispersed by wind or animals.
